data.lyric:
[ti:False God]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Lover]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]False God - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:02.22]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff
[00:04.44]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff
[00:06.66]We were crazy to think
[00:08.71]Crazy to think that this could work
[00:10.17]Remember how I said I'd die for you
[00:18.69]We were stupid to jump
[00:20.86]In the ocean separating us remember how I'd fly to you
[00:29.39]And I can't talk to you when you're like this
[00:33.15]Staring out the window like I'm not your favorite town
[00:36.10]I'm New York City
[00:38.69]I still do it for you babe
[00:41.48]They all warned us about times like this
[00:44.62]They say the road gets hard and you get lost
[00:47.07]When you're led by blind faith
[00:50.49]Blind faith
[00:53.68]But we might just get away with it
[00:58.08]Religion's in your lips
[01:01.03]Even if it's a false god
[01:04.89]We'd still worship
[01:05.87]We might just get away with it
[01:10.02]The altar is my hips
[01:13.03]Even if it's a false god
[01:16.94]We'd still worship this love
[01:19.99]We'd still worship this love
[01:22.94]We'd still worship this love
[01:30.59]I know heaven's a thing
[01:33.03]I go there when you touch me honey
[01:34.70]Hell is when I fight with you
[01:42.47]But we can patch it up good
[01:44.77]Make confessions and we're begging for forgiveness
[01:47.04]Got the wine for you
[01:53.37]And you can't talk to me when I'm like this
[01:57.27]Daring you to leave me just so I can try and scare you
[02:00.10]You're the West Village
[02:02.66]You still do it for me babe
[02:05.52]They all warned us about times like this
[02:08.69]They say the road gets hard and you get lost
[02:11.03]When you're led by blind faith
[02:14.48]Blind faith
[02:17.70]But we might just get away with it
[02:22.00]Religion's in your lips
[02:25.01]Even if it's a false god
[02:28.92]We'd still worship
[02:29.85]We might just get away with it
[02:34.04]The altar is my hips
[02:37.02]Even if it's a false god
[02:40.97]We'd still worship this love
[02:43.93]We'd still worship this love
[02:46.99]We'd still worship this love
[02:53.03]Still worship this love
[02:56.04]Even if it's a false god
[02:58.95]Even if it's a false god
[03:02.18]Still worship this
[03:03.98]Love
data.trans:
[ti:False God]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Lover]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.22]//
[00:04.44]//
[00:06.66]是我们丧失理智
[00:08.71]才会妄想我们能携手永远
[00:10.17]记得我曾说过 我愿为你赴汤蹈火
[00:18.69]是我们太傻 才会纵身跃下爱情海洋
[00:20.86]是这惊涛骇浪让你我天各一方 我不顾一切地来到你身边
[00:29.39]看到你这个样子 我甚至不敢开口
[00:33.15]你呆呆地望着窗外 仿佛我不再是你最爱的故乡
[00:36.10]而是个远在纽约的陌生人
[00:38.69]宝贝 我对你的心一如当初
[00:41.48]身边的人曾警告我很多次
[00:44.62]他们说 如果仅仅依靠盲目的信仰
[00:47.07]情路将充满坎坷 最终彻底迷失
[00:50.49]盲目的信仰
[00:53.68]但我们也许能侥幸成功
[00:58.08]你总是把信仰挂在嘴边
[01:01.03]即使那只是一个幻想出来的神
[01:04.89]我们依然崇拜
[01:05.87]我们也许能侥幸成功
[01:10.02]圣坛是我的精神寄托
[01:13.03]即使那只是一个幻想出来的神
[01:16.94]我们依然珍视这份爱
[01:19.99]我们依然珍视这份爱
[01:22.94]我们依然珍视这份爱
[01:30.59]我知道
[01:33.03]当你爱抚我时 我仿佛来到天堂
[01:34.70]而当你和我争吵时 我瞬间跌入地狱
[01:42.47]但我们可以重修旧好
[01:44.77]诚心忏悔 祈求宽恕
[01:47.04]我为你准备了红酒
[01:53.37]看到我这个样子 你最好不要打扰
[01:57.27]你敢离开我吗 我只是想吓唬吓唬你
[02:00.10]你已成为过去式
[02:02.66]你对我的心一如当初 宝贝
[02:05.52]身边的人曾警告我们很多次
[02:08.69]他们说 如果仅仅依靠盲目的信仰
[02:11.03]情路将充满坎坷 最终彻底迷失
[02:14.48]盲目的信仰
[02:17.70]但我们也许能侥幸成功
[02:22.00]你总是把信仰挂在嘴边
[02:25.01]即使那只是一个幻想出来的神
[02:28.92]我们依然崇拜
[02:29.85]我们也许能侥幸成功
[02:34.04]圣坛是我的精神寄托
[02:37.02]即使那只是一个幻想出来的神
[02:40.97]我们依然珍视这份爱
[02:43.93]我们依然珍视这份爱
[02:46.99]我们依然珍视这份爱
[02:53.03]依然珍视这份爱
[02:56.04]即使那只是一个幻想出来的神
[02:58.95]即使那只是一个幻想出来的神
[03:02.18]依然会珍视这份
[03:03.98]爱
